prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Reed, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:

This composition features Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, and Reed, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:

Style 3:
